downloadTitle: Update Rollup for Microsoft Azure Site Recovery Provider (3.5.468.0)
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Azure Site Recovery Provider needs to be installed by the user in order to connect to the Microsoft Azure Site Recovery Service
detailsSection:
The Microsoft Azure Site Recovery Provider needs to be installed by the user on the Virtual Machine Manager server in order to connect to the Microsoft Azure Site Recovery Service.
Download and install this provider version to enable the VMM server to communicate to the Azure Site Recovery service to:
  • Enable Replication between the VMs on an on-premises site to Azure or to a secondary site.
  • Seamlessly failover virtual machines from the primary site to Azure or a secondary site.
  • Make use of Recovery plans and other features of the Microsoft Azure Site Recovery service.

Release History
Previous Provider Version : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider ( Version 3.4.137.0) is available at http://download.microsoft.com/download/A/0/C/A0C3CB50-5D30-4269-AB56-E9559A33209D/VMMHRMProvider_x64.exe
Previous Provider Version : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider ( Version 3.3.160.1) is available at http://download.microsoft.com/download/A/0/C/A0C3CB50-5D30-4269-AB56-E9559A33209D/VMMHRMProvider_x64.exe
Previous Provider Version : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider ( Version 3.3.150.0) is available at http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=42635
Previous Provider Version : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider (Version 3.3.140.0) is available at http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=42285 Previous Provider Version (Pre-release) : Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider ( Version 3.3.100.0) is available at http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=35ac9a9c-4315-4bbe-9297-b792903e7666
systemRequirementsSection:
The following are the system requirements for the provider to be installed:
System Center 2012 R2 RTM Virtual Machine Manager along with Windows Server R2 RTM installed on primary and secondary hosts or Windows Server 2012 installed on primary and secondary hosts.

System Center Virtual Machine Manager SP1 CU3 or above needs to be installed along with Windows Server 2012 with latest updates.

Please refer to prerequisites and support matrix for Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Service to ensure that all the pre-requisites for Hyper-V Recovery Manager environment are met.
installInstructionSection: Download the Windows Azure Hyper-V Recovery Manager Provider setup on the host with a supported version of System Center Virtual Machine Manager installed and run it.
